# promptr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `promptr` is to create a simple interface for `R` users to format and submit prompts to OpenAI's Large Language Models (LLMs).

## Installation

You can install the development version of promptr from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("joeornstein/promptr")
```

## Example

This is a basic example:

```{r example}
library(promptr)

prompt <- format_prompt(text = 'I am genuinely morose.', 
                        instructions = 'Classify this text as sad or happy.')
prompt

complete_prompt(prompt)
```
